testcase.classname: Main Page Modules and their functionality
testcase.name: chromium › Main Page Modules and their functionality › navigation to Dashboard Module
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to Dashboard "english".....................................passed Then verify that dashboard page tab name contains QUGEM...................passed And verify DashBoard Module Button is visible and is Clickable............passed Then click the Dashboard module...........................................passed And verify the URL of the dashboard should be "https://qugem-staging.ne...passed And I should see the message "Hello, welcome to the QUGEM homepage."......passed

testcase.classname: Testing Navigation Success with valid and invalid credentials

testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to Login Page..............................................passed Then Enter a valid email..................................................passed Then Enter a valid password...............................................passed Then Click the login button after choosing english language...............passed And Verify that user is now on the Dasboard Page url after clicking log...passed Then verify that dashboard page tab name contains QUGEM...................passed Then Click the sign out button and verify you are in sign in page again...passed

failure.message:
Error: expect(received).not.toBe(expected) // Object.is equality
Expected: not "Bitte geben Sie eine korrekte E-Mail-Adresse ein." at ../.cucumber/stepDefinitions/steps_LoginPage.js:83
81 | console.log("Bug report :in english language ,warning is in deutsch language and other problem warning is not for password") 82 | > 83 | expect(popupText).not.toBe("Bitte geben Sie eine korrekte E-Mail-Adresse ein.") | ^ 84 | 85 | }); 86 |

81 | console.log("Bug report :in english language ,warning is in deutsch language and other problem warning is not for password") 82 | > 83 | expect(popupText).not.toBe("Bitte geben Sie eine korrekte E-Mail-Adresse ein.") | ^ 84 | 85 | }); 86 |
